overview_title: Welcome to the Unofficial Crusader Patch
overview_intro: This project is an unofficial patch for FireFly Studio's game Stronghold Crusader. It features bug-fixes, balancing changes, quality-of-life improvements, and community-made AI castles and content.
overview_quickstart_text: To install the patch, download the latest release from GitHub, place it in your Stronghold Crusader installation directory, and run the installer.
overview_contribute_text: Have ideas or want to help? Visit our GitHub repository to post issues, suggest features, or contribute to the code. All help is welcome!
